name: SLIMERGENCE
description:
A twist on the classic tile merging game 2048 - Help the weak Slimes grow stronger through merging, but watch out for the Hero! 

The weakest Slimes leave behind residue which spawn new Slimes, while the Hero slays any slimes he collides with by chance. Try to merge and form the Golden Slime, who can finally defeat the Hero!

ASSETS USED

Slime - https://ivess.itch.io/slime-animations-pack

Hero - https://elthen.itch.io/pixel-art-adventurer-sprites

GUI - https://paperhatlizard.itch.io/cryos-mini-gui

https://mounirtohami.itch.io/pixel-art-gui-elements

Background - https://saurabhkgp.itch.io/pixel-art-forest-background-simple-seamless-parallax-...
